page.title: 06DAVID'S LETTER TO B.V.T.
page.content: Dear Bournville Village Trust, I am writing to thank you for giving us your time to talk to us about the land around Weatheroak Hill.I didn know that the{Bournville VillageTrust} owned so much land around Wythall and Weatheroak Hill.Thank you for the copies of the photographs and of the maps.The information you have given us will be very helpful in our Domesday Survey.Yours sincerely.{David R.} When we were surveying the farms in our D-Block, we discovered that most of the farmers rent their land from the B.V.T. who bought it in the 1930's to preserve the {Green Belt} area around Birmingham.Weatheroak Hall hasn't changed and is now used as a Golf Club.{Silvermead
